data.text:
No 3 Silapathar Block

Block / Subdivision → Sissibargaon

District → Dhemaji

State → Assam

About No 3 Silapathar Block

According to Census 2011 information the location code or village code of No 3 Silapathar Block village is 289087. No 3 Silapathar Block village is located in Sissibargaon subdivision of Dhemaji district in Assam, India. It is situated 3km away from sub-district headquarter Sissibargaon (tehsildar office) and 25km away from district headquarter Dhemaji. As per 2009 stats, Ujani Sissitangani is the gram panchayat of No 3 Silapathar Block village.

The total geographical area of village is 135.18 hectares. No 3 Silapathar Block has a total population of 592 peoples, out of which male population is 316 while female population is 276. Literacy rate of no 3 silapathar block village is 79.90% out of which 81.65% males and 77.90% females are literate. There are about 122 houses in no 3 silapathar block village. Pincode of no 3 silapathar block village locality is 787059.

Silapathar is nearest town to no 3 silapathar block for all major economic activities, which is approximately 1km away.
